column4: but I am doing a lot of reading in ubuntu planet and also the how to's
is kind of a whole new experience for me
but I do really love ubuntu
in fact since I installed a week ago , I haven't restarted to windows
do I need an antivirus like on xp ?
unless you want to make sure you are not spreading infected files to other user who are using Windows
for your own system .. no ... not needed
which graphic card are you using?
is this the first time you are using Linux?
look at what you want to do and start to gather the programs you need
I have not read it once entirely :)
